content: conspicuously inconspicuous - that s the motto for these socks for men made in regia premium merino yak the color is subtle but the pattern has it all conversion to all other sizes is easy thanks tot he stitch repeat of only 4 stitches this pattern was published first in regia 3-ply and is now adapted to 4-ply as the stitch repeat is a multiple of 4 you can easily convert this pattern in all sizes and yarn strenghts the pattern refers to the sock guide r0333 for working the heel and toe
